cgcloud__Signature_Template__c.name: cgcloud__Signature_Template__c
cgcloud__Signature_Template__c.description: Stores the details of the signature template object that's used for signature flow steps.

LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

cgcloud__Active__c.description: Controls whether the template can be used to create signatures.

cgcloud__Attribute_Set__c.description: Defines the combinations of the attribute.

cgcloud__Capture_Location__c.description: Controls whether GPS coordinates are to be captured during the signature process.

cgcloud__Description__c.description: Description based on the user-specified language.

cgcloud__Mobility_Relevant__c.description: Controls whether the template is usable on Mobility devices.

cgcloud__Sales_Org__c.description: Reference to the internal sales organization segment.
